text: Raúl Zerimar Ramírez Cota (born November 19, 1994 in Sinaloa) is a Mexican professional footballer who currently plays for U. de G. He made his professional debut with Chiapas during a Copa MX defeat to Veracruz on 26 February 2014. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Chiapas F.C. footballers Category:Murciélagos FC footballers Category:Loros UdeC footballers Category:Leones Negros UdeG Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Liga Premier de México players Category:Footballers from Sinaloa Category:People from Ahome Municipality
title: Raúl Zerimar Ramírez
